author: mmlohia
title: Darjeeling Gangtok
text: We (I and my wife) on our 25th anniversary planning a 6 night trip from Bagdogra reaching 12 noon to Bagdogra 12 noon between 7 Dec to 13 Dec. I need suggestion about a relaxed itinerary but a bit different experience. In general, 7 Dec: Reaching Darjeeling and some local sight seeing (may be mall road walking) 8 Dec: Tiger Hill and other sight seeing 9 Dec: Leaving for Kalimpong after BF 10 Dec: Local sight seeing after checking out from Kalimpong, reaching Gangtok and Local market walk 11 Dec: Gangtok: Nathula and Lake 12 Dec: Gangtok: Rumtek and other sight seeing 13 Dec: To Bagdogra (2) What will be temp like (will be possible to go to Tiger Hill and Nathula (3) Which Hotels , boutique/small but different, should I prefer: open for any budget (4) Which are must see and which can be avoided, not many monastaries on my card (as recently returned from Leh) (5) Any wild life or National Park worth spending a night and changing itiniery. (6) How to handle local travel ? Do we hire a vehicle from Bagdogra ? Any good travel agent ? (7) Any other suggestion to make it a different trip Thanx
